tweakermore.autoFillContainerThreshold.c:
The minimum occupied slot amount for the item to trigger tweak tweakmAutoFillContainer
e.g. if you always have 2 slots of firework rocket you can set the value to 3,
 then your rockets will never be used to fill the container
tweakermore.netherPortalSoundChance.comm:
The chance for a nether portal block to play sound
Set it to 0.001 or 0.0001 for less noisy portal
tweakermore.villagerOfferUsesDisplay.com:
Display villager offer use and limit amount on villager offer list
Hover on the arrow of the offer to see it
tweakermore.shulkerTooltipEnchantmentHin: Display enchantments of items in the tooltip of shulker box item
tweakermore.chatMessageLimit.comment: Modify the maximum number of history messages stored in the chat hud
tweakermore.safeAfkHealthThreshold.comme:
The threshold of the health of the player which triggers the safe afk disconnecting feature
Disconnect when player takes damage and its health becomes less than the given value
tweakermore.copySignTextToClipBoard.comm: Copy texts in the sign you are pointing to into the clipboard
tweakermore.handRestockListType.comment: The item restriction type for tweakHandRestock
tweakermore.handRestockWhiteList.comment: The items that will trigger tweakHandRestock
tweakermore.handRestockBlackList.comment: The items that will NOT trigger tweakHandRestock
tweakermore.prioritizedCommandSuggestion:
Command suggestions in this list will be more forward in the command completion list
You can put those command completions you always prefer to choose in this list
so they will always be at the head of the command completion list
tweakermore.tweakmAutoCleanContainer.com:
Automatically drops everything in the opened container
and then close the container
tweakermore.tweakmAutoCleanContainer.con: Dropped all items in %1$s slots inside %2$s
tweakermore.tweakmAutoFillContainer.comm:
Automatically fill the opened container with the most numerous item stack in your inventory
iff the item stack is the only most numerous one
and then close the container
tweakermore.tweakmAutoFillContainer.best: Most suitable item to fill the container not found
tweakermore.tweakmAutoPickSchematicBlock:
Pick block from schematic automatically before block placement
It's logic is the same as the pickBlock tweaks in litematica mod, you need to enable pickBlockEnabled option in litematica
Does not work with easy place mode
tweakermore.tweakmSafeAfk.comment:
Disconnect when receive damage
Health threshold to disconnect can be set via safeAfkHealthThreshold
tweakermore.ofUnlockF3FpsLimit.comment: Removed 10 FPS render limit for F3 debug hud
tweakermore.xmapNoSessionFinalizationWai:
Skip the session finalization operation when quit a world
So no lag when quitting server or single player
Might have some side effects though
tweakermore.applyTweakerMoreOptionLabelG: Apply the TweakerMore style translated text + original text label to all config GUIs using malilib
tweakermore.openTweakerMoreConfigGui.com: Open the config GUI of TweakerMore
tweakermore.preserveConfigUnknownEntries:
Preserve unknown config entries in TweakerMore's config file
If set to false, unknown entries will be removed on config being written
tweakermore.hideDisabledOptions.comment: Hide options which are disabled due to mod relations unsatisfied in the config GUI
tweakermore.gui.title: TweakerMore v%1$s Config GUI
